headline: Coinbase to join the S&P 500: What Wall Street thinks about crypto
summary: Shares of Coinbase Global (COIN) are seeing gains of 25% on Tuesday after announcements that the cryptocurrency exchange will be joining the S&P 500 (^GSPC) on May 19, replacing Discover Financial Services (DFS) on the stock market index. Yahoo Finance senior business reporter Ines Ferré examines Wall Street's coverage on Coinbase and analysts' forecasts on the growing crypto market in the US. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination here.

headline: Why Coinbase (COIN) Stock Is Up Today
summary: Shares of blockchain infrastructure company Coinbase (NASDAQ:COIN) jumped 22.9% in the afternoon session after the S&P Dow Jones Indices announced that the company would join the S&P 500 Index before the start of trading on Monday, May 19, 2025. The S&P 500 is a widely followed index that tracks the performance of the 500 largest companies in the United States.

headline: Coinbase to Join S&P 500 in Crypto Milestone. The Stock Is Jumping.
summary: The cryptocurrency exchange  Coinbase Global will join the benchmark index  from May 19, marking an important milestone for the crypto sector.  While not entirely unexpected—Coinbase is one of the largest companies based on market value not currently part of the index—shares soared 17% to $241.65 in early trading Tuesday.  Stocks added to the S&P 500 tend to go up as funds that track the index, such as  will add it to its holdings.

headline: China unbans Boeing, United CEO on safety, Coinbase to join S&P 500
summary: China has lifted its ban on Boeing (BA) plane deliveries to Chinese airlines, according to a Bloomberg report. United Airlines (UAL) CEO Scott Kirby addresses the safety concerns around Newark Liberty International Airport following reported outages of air traffic controller communications. Coinbase (COIN) will be joining the S&P 500 (^GSPC) on May 19, replacing Discover Financial Services (DFS). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief here.

headline: Coinbase shares jump on addition to S&P 500 index in watershed for crypto market
summary: Coinbase Global's shares jumped nearly 15% on Tuesday after the cryptocurrency exchange became the first digital asset player to be included in the benchmark S&P 500 index.  With surging institutional interest, crypto has rapidly moved into the mainstream, especially after President Donald Trump promised a lighter regulatory touch.  "We believe S&P 500 inclusion will benefit Coinbase for a while as institutional investors take time to prepare to get into the stock," Oppenheimer analysts noted after raising price target to $293.
